note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Income or consumption of the poorest and richest 10%
subtitle: Shown is the income or consumption per person per day at the cutoff to the poorest 10% and richest 10% in each country. This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
